text: Approval for the Passive Plus(R) DX Endocardial, Steroid Eluting, Passive-Fixation Pacing Leads, Models 1342T, 1343K, 1346T, and 1345K.  This device is indicated for use in combination with a compatible pulse generator to provide permanent pacing and sensing in either the atrium (Models 1342T or 1343K) or ventricle (Models 1345K or 1346T).
